site_option.one: Spare Parts - Salvage - Towing - Bodywork - Car Recovery - Mechanic - Electrician

order.title: Order:
order.spare_desc: Send your request to all spare parts or salvage shops.
order.description: We provide you with the advantage of the Car Market website, which allows you to sell your car or search for a suitable car through a categorized and filtered search, helping you find the right car. Simply showcase your car, provide its details, and complete your transactions with ease.
order.button: Go to the Car Market Now

home.application: You can now download the application from

about_cars.title: About Car Market
about_cars.half_title: Car Market for all car services
about_cars.description: Car Market is a company established for your convenience to access various car services. It generates Arabic text, allowing you to generate such text or many other texts. In addition, it increases the number of characters generated by the application. If you need more paragraphs, the Arabic text generator allows you to increase the number of paragraphs as you wish.

about_carz.title: It has become easy to provide services for your car. This is our first goal, and you can find them all in one place at Cars
about_carz.section_title2: Service request for maintenance or diagnosis from: Panel Beater, Mechanic, or Auto Electrician
about_carz.desc1: In this service, just create your request, write your needed parts, and select to send your request to spare parts shops or junkyards, or both, and the spare parts shops or junkyards located in your area will respond to you with the availability, price , and quality of the requested parts. Do not waste your time and effort searching and pricing, create your request and choose the suitable for you. (Service request is free)
about_carz.desc2: In this service, just create your request and write a description of the problem or repair you want, and they will reply to you at the cost of repair. Do not waste your time and effort searching and pricing, create your request and choose the suitable for you. (Service request is free)
about_carz.desc3: In this service, just create your request, specify the location of the car and the location of the destination, and the tow trucks owners in your area around you will respond to your request with the price and arrival time, with the ability to track the tow truck owner on the map when he is heading to you. Do not waste your time and effort searching and pricing, create your request and choose the suitable for you. (The service is free)

sign_up.title: Welcome to Cars
sign_up.desc: Enter the following data to continue and create a new account
sign_up.buyer: Log in as a service provider/seller
sign_up.name: full name

login.title: Welcome back
login.desc: Enter your mobile number and password to log in

recover.title: Password Recovery
recover.desc: Enter the mobile number with which the account is registered to send your password recovery code

recover_code.title: Recovery code
recover_code.desc: Enter the 6-digit code sent to a number

new_password.title: New Password
new_password.desc: Create a strong password consisting of 8 letters, numbers and symbols

about_us.title: About CARS
about_us.desc: CARS website and application aims to organize the field of car services, CARS let the seller or service provider to seeing the requests in his area that relate to his activity, and making it easier for the buyer or service requester to create a request for all sellers or service providers, without the hassle of searching and losing time and effort.
about_us.desc_2: CARS includes Car Auction section for buying and selling the cars.
about_us.desc_5: Maintenance requests from: Panel beaters, Mechanics, and Auto electricians.
about_us.sub_desc: Request the service directly by clicking on it when you choose one of the services below
about_us.spare_desc: Send your request to all spare parts or repair shops

add_car.title: To complete the order, please select the car
add_car.desc: To request the service, we want you to add your car details to help you get your needs correct
add_car.placeholder: Select the car from the My Cars list

add_new_car.title: Add a new car
add_new_car.hent: Chassis Number helps sellers know which parts are compatible with your car

edit_car.title: Edit Car
edit_car.desc: To request a car modification, we want you to add your car details to help you get your needs right

done_add_car.desc: The car has been successfully added to my personal car list

order_spare.title: Request spare parts
order_spare.desc: Please enter the following information to continue and so that you can order the parts you want, with the importance of choosing the car and specifying the number of parts
order_spare.name: The name of piece
order_spare.name_placeholder: Type the name of the piece
order_spare.quality_placeholder: Select the desired industry for the part

popup.done: The request has been successfully sent
popup.name: Part Name
popup.hent: Please note that you need to repost the request after 48 hours from posting it through the

order_workshop.title: Maintenance Workshop Request
order_workshop.desc: Enter the following information to proceed and select the type of maintenance you need, and choose the car so we can assist you.

car_holder.title: Tow Truck Request
car_holder.desc: Enter the following information to proceed and select the destination, the pickup location, and the car you need to be transported so we can assist you.
car_holder.location_placeholder: Please specify the current location on the map...
car_holder.current_done: The current location has been determined
car_holder.interface_placeholder: Select the interface on the map

contact_us.title: Contact Us
contact_us.desc: Contact us by filling out the information below, and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
contact_us.name: Full Name
contact_us.stay_desc: Contact us now using the information below, and we will get in touch with you as soon as possible.

popup_report.title: Please state the reason for reporting

add_ads_car.title: New Ad
add_ads_car.disc: Enter the following data to continue offering your car for sale through the application
add_ads_car.adress_disc: Enter keywords about the car details (e.g., Brand, Model, etc.)
add_ads_car.hide: Hide phone number and communicate through the website only
add_ads_car.car_details_placeholder: Example: I am the first owner of the car and it has scratches + a picture...

edit_ads_car.title: Edit Advertisement
edit_ads_car.disc: Edit the following data to continue displaying your car for sale through the application

account_setting.disc: You can change your account settings as well as change your password.

uplaod_photo: Upload a photo not exceeding 35 megabytes

my_cars.title: My Cars
my_cars.disc: Here are your cars that you have added. You can also add more cars here to request services for them or use them in the car market.

my_order.title: My Orders
my_order.disc: Here, you can add orders for services you've requested.
my_order.not: You haven't placed any orders yet!

my_ads.title: My Ads
my_ads.disc: Here you can view the ads you have posted in the car market, and you can delete or edit the ad at any time.

harag_message.title: Car Market Messages
harag_message.disc: Here you can view messages related to car market transactions and messages exchanged between advertisers, or messages sent specifically for the car market.

requestes_message.title: Responses
requestes_message.disc: Here you can view responses from service providers for your created requests.
requestes_message.select_spare: Select the agreed-upon parts to hide them from other sellers, then click 'Confirm'.
requestes_message.heddin_spare: Agreement reached, and the parts are hidden from other sellers.
requestes_message.click_here: Click here to confirm the purchase
requestes_message.complet_buy: The purchase for car spare parts is complete. Don't forget to rate your experience with the seller.
requestes_message.done_deal_message: You cannot send a message to an agreed order

register.title: Complete Your Information
register.set_image: Upload the image you want to add or select it from

orders.spare_desc: Click on the available parts you have, mention the price and industry, then click send to the buyer.
orders.flatnies: You can request a price quote for transportation between the two specified locations by the service requester by placing the price below the location.

done_add_offer.title: Your offer has been sent to the service requester. They will respond to you upon accepting the offer.

attempts.title: The allowed daily attempts are 2 attempts for free usage, renewing daily.

my_points.title: My Points
my_points.desc: Here, the points you earn through your activity on the site are calculated, and they can be converted into money. You can use them to renew your subscription.

subscriptions.title: Subscriptions
subscriptions.desc: Choose your distinctive package that you want to subscribe to based on the type of service you provide.

FriendsClaims.title: Friends Invitations
FriendsClaims.desc: Use the method that suits you to send invitations to friends.

card_one.desc: You can send the invitation by copying the link below. You can also share it through social media.

card_two.desc: You can send the invitation by copying the username from the app and pasting it here. Then click the Send button, and we will send the invitation.

card_three.desc: You can send the invitation by printing the barcode below and placing it in front of customers to increase your balance through invitations.

not_open_chat: Click on the chat icon to open the menu and respond to service requests
